thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Gategroup CEO expects revenue to grow 5-7 pct in 2018

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Gategroup CEO expects revenue to grow 5-7 pct in 2018
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - HNA Group Co Ltd:
* GATEGROUP CEO TELL REUTERS VALUATION OF COMPANY AFTER IPO WILL BE SIGNIFICANTLY HIGHER THAN WHEN HNA BOUGHT IT (ADDS DROPPED WORD “HIGHER”)
* GATEGROUP CEO SAYS COMPANY IS 100 PERCENT FINANCIALLY INDEPENDENT FROM HNA, NO FINANCIAL MOVEMENTS BETWEEN THE COMPANIES
* GATEGROUP CEO SAYS FURTHER INCREASES IN PROFIT MARGIN POSSIBLE
* GATEGROUP CEO SAYS EXPECTS COMPANY REVENUE TO GROW 5 TO 7 PERCENT IN 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting By Zurich newsroom)
